titles.title: Protection and Reduction of Government Secrecy Act
A bill to create a bipartisan commission to recommend ways to strengthen the protection of classified information and eliminate the classification of nonsensitive information.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S596-597)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Title I: Short Title - Protection and Reduction of Government Secrecy Act - Sets forth the short title of this Act. Title II: Commission on Protecting and Reducing Government Secrecy - Establishes a commission to recommend ways to reduce the volume of information classified and to increase protection of classified information. Authorizes appropriations.
